text: Tara balala, ‘he luta! Niscaya amara apanara raba prerita phiris‌ta. Tara kakhana'i apanara kache paumchate parabe na [1]. Kaje'i apani ratera kono eka samaye apanara paribara barga saha bera haye paruna [2] ebam apanadera madhye ke'o pichanera dike takabe na, apanara stri chara [3]. Tadera ya ghatabe tamra'o ta'i ghatabe. Niscaya prabhata tadera jan'ya nirdharita samaya. Prabhata ki khuba kachakachi naya?’
